channel.title: ::Save
channel.description: can someone tell me the code for the ::save command to save char files... someones server used to have it for restarts... he would save char files and restart the server to update it, after compiling that is... lol does anyone no it or no a code for ::save so players can do it themselves :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: ::Save
item.dc:creator: @pk3zoi pk3zoi
item.description:
@pk3zoi wrote:

Well, depending on if your the player or the coder it might be different codes. If your a coder, depending on your source base, it could be like ::reset or ::reboot. If you don’t have a save command just make one.

If (command.equalsIgnoreCase("save")) { savemoreinfo(); savechar(); }

Or

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("whateverhere") && playerRights >= 3) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;

You might have a “kickall” command, use that. Because when you kick a player it saves their file, so if you kick ALL the players, it saves ALL the files, allowing you to immediatly reboot the server.

Read full topic
